name: methylseq-fst
title: DNA Methylation Analysis
description: Comprehensive pipeline for analyzing DNA methylation patterns from bisulfite sequencing data. Performs methylation-aware alignment, quantification, and quality control. Ideal for epigenetic studies in development, disease, and environmental responses.
content:
ðŸ§¬ Overview

The DNA Methylation Analysis pipeline enables comprehensive profiling of cytosine methylation patterns from bisulfite sequencing data. This workflow performs methylation-aware alignment, quantifies methylation levels at single-base resolution, and provides detailed quality control metrics for epigenetic insights.

ðŸ”§ Main Capabilities

This pipeline integrates specialized tools for bisulfite sequencing analysis:

  • Quality Control: FastQC and Trim Galore for bisulfite-specific read processing
  • Alignment Options: Bismark (default) or bwa-meth for methylation-aware mapping
  • Methylation Calling: Single-base resolution CpG, CHG, and CHH context analysis
  • Deduplication: Remove PCR duplicates to ensure accurate methylation quantification
  • Coverage Analysis: Genome-wide methylation coverage and distribution reports
  • Visualization: MultiQC report with bisulfite conversion rates and M-bias plots

ðŸ“‹ Input Parameters

Samplesheet Format: Provide a CSV file with sample information following this structure:

sample,fastq_1,fastq_2
control_rep1,/path/to/control_rep1_R1.fastq.gz,/path/to/control_rep1_R2.fastq.gz
control_rep2,/path/to/control_rep2_R1.fastq.gz,/path/to/control_rep2_R2.fastq.gz
treated_rep1,/path/to/treated_rep1_R1.fastq.gz,/path/to/treated_rep1_R2.fastq.gz
treated_rep2,/path/to/treated_rep2_R1.fastq.gz,/path/to/treated_rep2_R2.fastq.gz
  • sample: Unique sample identifier
  • fastq_1/2: Paths to paired-end bisulfite FASTQ files (single-end: fastq_1 only)

Reference Genome: Provide a FASTA file URL or path for the reference genome. The pipeline will automatically prepare bisulfite conversion indices.

ðŸ’¡ Resource Optimization: For optimal resource consumption, the number of nodes should not be greater than the number of samples in your samplesheet.

ðŸ”¬ Scientific Relevance & Use Cases

This pipeline is essential for:

  • Epigenetic Studies: Understanding methylation changes in development and differentiation
  • Disease Research: Identifying aberrant methylation patterns in cancer and neurological disorders
  • Environmental Epigenetics: Studying methylation responses to environmental factors
  • Imprinting Analysis: Characterizing parent-of-origin specific methylation

The pipeline supports whole-genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS), reduced representation bisulfite sequencing (RRBS), and targeted bisulfite sequencing approaches.

ðŸ“Š Expected Outputs

  • Methylation Calls: BED/bedGraph files with methylation percentages per cytosine
  • Coverage Reports: Genome-wide methylation coverage statistics
  • M-bias Plots: Position-specific methylation bias assessment
  • Bisulfite Conversion: Non-CpG methylation rates indicating conversion efficiency
  • Aligned BAMs: Methylation-aware alignments for visualization

Built with Nextflow and the nf-core/methylseq pipeline v4.0.0
